item.title: Fasten Seat Belt While Seated Placards

remarks.para: One or more signs or placards may be illegible or missing provided a legible sign or placard is readable from each occupied passenger seat.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel stating: "FASTEN SEAT BELT WHILE SEATED PLACARD/SIGN – MISSING or INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
